body.p: Dear Chris, Ashley, and all the diabolical geniuses at Nerdist Industries.
Just who do you think you are to try to bribe me into an appearance on your 'thing' with this gift of the most fantastic Corona Silent typewriter made 1934?

You are out of your minds if you think... that I...
, this thing has great action... and, this deep crimson color... Wait! I'm not so shallow as to... and it types nearly silently...
Oh, OKAY! I will have my people contact yours and work out some kind of interview process... Damn you all to hell,
